page_1.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Ah, howdy once again?
* I didn’t expect another
call so soon.
page_2.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Heh. Hope I'm not
bothering you. I just
had a quick question.
page_4.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Okay, so, just outta
curiosity, what’s with
the imposing door?
page_5.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
SILLY HUMAN: THAT'S
THE DOOR TO SANTA'S
SECRET WORK.SHOFP!
page_6.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
NATURALLY, IT'S
THERE AS A SECURITY
MEASURE.
page_7.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* True, Papyrus, but
there’s more to the
story than that.
page_8.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* You see, long ago, we
monsters fled deep into
the Underground.
page_9.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* lle feared the humans
would pursue us, so we
constructed this door.
page_10.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* And we filled the Ruins
with puzzles as an added
precaution.
page_11.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
OH MY GOD, IS5 1T
TIME FOR A PUzzLE
HISTORY LESSONT
page_12.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* Hoho! Well, perhaps
at some point, but as
I was saying...
page_13.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* The Ruins were our
original home, which we
called... well, “Home.”
page_14.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
** Yes, I know it’s not the
most original name, but
it got the job done.
page_15.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* But it’s kinda weird.
* The Ruins feel so cut
off from everything.
page_16.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* 0Oh, well, it’s partly
a matter of keeping out
the cold...
page_17.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* And partly a matter of
privacy. After all, so
much has changed.
page_18.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* But don’t worry! My door
is always open to you
two.
page_19.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗:
* If you ever need
anything, please don’t
hesitate to ask.
